programme.title: Made in Hollywood
programme.sub-title: Life of Chuck, The Unholy Trinity, Deep Cover
programme.desc: Interviews with the cast and filmmakers of Life of Chuck, The Unholy Trinity, Deep Cover, Barron's Cove, and Shadow Force.

programme.title: Land Of The Bears
programme.desc: Set in the wilderness of the Kamchatka Peninsula, the land of legends and the kingdom of wild brown bears, we follow the daily adventures of five wild brown bears.

programme.title: Speed Kills
programme.desc: Speedboat racing champion and multimillionaire Ben Aronoff leads a double life that lands him in trouble with the law and drug lords.

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A drama centered around the relationship between journalist Michael Finkel and Christian Longo, an FBI Most Wanted List murderer who for years lived outside the U.S. under Finkel's name.

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: A woman turns to prescription medication as a way of handling her anxiety concerning her husband's upcoming release from prison.

programme.title: The Runner
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the BP oil spill, an idealistic but imperfect New Orleans politician (Nicolas Cage) finds his plans of restoration unraveling as his own life becomes contaminated with corruption, scandal and deceit.

programme.title: Moneyball
programme.desc: The story of Oakland Athletics general manager Billy Beane's successful attempt to put together a baseball team on a budget, by employing computer-generated analysis to draft his players.

programme.title: Lost River
programme.desc: Billy, a single mother of two, is led into a macabre underworld while her teenage son, Bones, discovers a secret road leading to an underwater town. Both Billy and Bones must dive deep into the mystery if their family is to survive.

programme.title: Guilty by Suspicion
programme.desc: This compelling story vividly recreates Hollywood's infamous 'Blacklist Era'. The witch-hunt has begun and director David Merrill can revive his stalled career by testifying against friends who are suspected communists. Merrill's ex wife shares a whirlpool of scandals that draws them closer together while his chances for ever making movies again slips further away...

programme.title: Memoirs of an Invisible Man
programme.desc: After a freak accident, an invisible yuppie runs for his life from a treacherous CIA official while trying to cope with his new life.

programme.title: Backtrace
programme.desc: The lone surviving thief of a violent armored car robbery is sprung from a high security facility and administered an experimental drug.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay, Part 1
programme.desc: Katniss Everdeen reluctantly becomes the symbol of a mass rebellion against the autocratic Capitol.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: An Amazon princess comes to the world of Man in the grips of the First World War to confront the forces of evil and bring an end to human conflict.

programme.title: Rambo III
programme.desc: Combat has taken its toll on Rambo, but he's finally begun to find inner peace in a monastery. When Rambo's friend and mentor Col. Trautman asks for his help on a top secret mission to Afghanistan, Rambo declines but must reconsider when Trautman is captured.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: As humanity picks up the pieces, following the conclusion of "Transformers: Dark of the Moon," Autobots and Decepticons have all but vanished from the face of the planet. However, a group of powerful, ingenious businessman and scientists attempt to learn from past Transformer incursions and push the boundaries of technology beyond what they can control - all while an ancient, powerful Transformer menace sets Earth in his cross-hairs.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Devoted lifeguard Mitch Buchannon butts heads with a brash new recruit. Together, they uncover a local criminal plot that threatens the future of the Bay.

programme.title: THE NUN II
programme.desc: In 1956 France, a priest is violently murdered, and Sister Irene begins to investigate. She once again comes face-to-face with a powerful evil.

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: When the coach of the France soccer team is killed by a poisoned dart in the stadium in the end of a game, and his expensive and huge ring with the diamond Pink Panther disappears, the ambitious Chief Inspector Dreyfus assigns the worst police inspector Jacques Clouseau to the case.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible -- Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt and his team are racing against time to track down a dangerous terrorist named Hendricks, who has gained access to Russian nuclear launch codes and is planning a strike on the United States. An attempt to stop him ends in an explosion causing severe destruction to the Kremlin and the IMF to be implicated in the bombing, forcing the President to disavow them. No longer being aided by the government, Ethan and his team chase Hendricks around the globe, although they might still be too l.

programme.title: Creed II
programme.desc: Between personal obligations and training for his next big fight against an opponent with ties to his family's past, Adonis Creed is up against the challenge of his life.

programme.title: Escape Plan 2: Hades
programme.desc: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: Born to Fight
programme.desc: When a remote Thai village is overrun by terrorists armed with a nuclear missile, an elite undercover operative leads the most unique fighting force ever assembled in a heroic bid to save their nation.

programme.title: Act of Valor
programme.desc: When a covert mission to rescue a kidnapped CIA operative uncovers a chilling plot, an elite, highly trained U.S. SEAL team speeds to hotspots around the globe, racing against the clock to stop a deadly terrorist attack.

programme.title: The Lego Movie 2: The Second Part
programme.desc: It's been five years since everything was awesome and the citizens are facing a huge new threat: LEGO DUPLO¬Æ invaders from outer space, wrecking everything faster than they can rebuild.

programme.title: The Darkest Hour
programme.desc: In Moscow, five young people lead the charge against an alien race which has attacked Earth via our power supply.

programme.title: G.I. Joe: Retaliation
programme.desc: Framed for crimes against the country, the G.I. Joe team is terminated by Presidential order. This forces the G.I. Joes into not only fighting their mortal enemy Cobra; they are forced to contend with threats from within the government that jeopardize their very existence.

programme.title: Apocalypto
programme.desc: Set in the Mayan civilization, when a man's idyllic presence is brutally disrupted by a violent invading force, he is taken on a perilous journey to a world ruled by fear and oppression where a harrowing end awaits him. Through a twist of fate and spurred by the power of his love for his woman and his family he will make a desperate break to return home and to ultimately save his way of life.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
